i <- as.numeric('{{i}}')

### `r tour[i]` {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

#### Chronologically

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis', message = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
t <- (all %>% filter(end == tour[i]) %>% arrange(desc(date))) %>% select(start, end, date, time, hm_h)
pander(t)
```

#### By time

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis', message = FALSE, eval = TRUE}
t <- (all %>% filter(end == tour[i] & time != "") %>% arrange(time, desc(date))) %>% select(start, end, date, time, hm_h)
pander(t)
```
